name: squaring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
square
square verb
(MULTIPLY)
[ T ] to multiply a number by itself: 10 squared equals a hundred. 42 means four squared, and equals 16.

square verb
(SHAPE)
square your shoulders
to pull your shoulders up and back because you feel determined to do something: He squared his shoulders and took a deep breath before diving into the pool.
